title: South Park Rally
description:
South Park Rally

In Acclaim&#039;s South Park Rally, all your favorite characters are screeching around
their sleepy Colorado town in dozens of sweet vehicles that could only exist 
in the demented world of Comedy Central&#039;s South Park! With Cartman on his police 
tricycle and Chef in his station wagon, the town will be in shambles before anyone
crosses the finish line.

With nine characters, including Cartman, Satan, Big Gay Al, and more to choose 
from, as well as 14 different races to unlock, you&#039;ll have hours of racing action.
Tracks include South Park Forest, Big Gay Al&#039;s Big Gay Animal Sanctuary, downtown
South Park, and more. Other special features of South Park Rally include multiple
secret characters and shortcuts; demented gadgets, such as Mexican staring frog,
chocolate salty balls, and more; multiple race modes and race objectives; and 
hundreds of hilarious sound bytes, created specifically for the game by South 
Park&#039;s creators, Matt Stone and Trey Parker.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
InFo:
Publisher: Acclaim
Developer: Tantalus Int.
Genre: Kart Racing
Release Date: Dec 31, 1999
ESRB: MATURE

Minimum System Requirements
System: Pentium-200 or equivalent
RAM: 32 MB
Video Memory: 4 MB
Hard Drive Space: 170 MB  
*Tested and working on Vista so should work without problems on Xp.
